{"type":"text","timestamp":1771660805898,"sessionID":"ses_380c9d776ffepvnO0VH05t5yXQ","part":{"id":"prt_c7f366606001vNs9jmXXgYohdq","sessionID":"ses_380c9d776ffepvnO0VH05t5yXQ","messageID":"msg_c7f3628d5001BYeMc4yhbTNN01","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
# Build stage
FROM maven:3.9-eclipse-temurin-17 AS builder
WORKDIR /build

# Create user for builder
RUN useradd -m -u 1001 appuser && \
    mkdir -p /build/logs && \
    chown -R appuser:appuser /build

USER appuser

# Copy pom.xml and dependencies first (caching)
COPY --chown=appuser:appuser pom.xml .
RUN mvn dependency:go-offline -B

# Copy source and build
COPY --chown=appuser:appuser src ./src
RUN mvn clean package -B -DskipTests

# Runtime stage
FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jre-alpine

# Install system packages for fonts and certificates
RUN apk add --no-cache \
    curl \
    fontconfig \
    ttf-dejavu \
    ca-certificates

# Import Azure DigiCert certificate into truststore
RUN keytool -importcert -trustcacerts \
    -alias azure-root-ca \
    -file /usr/share/ca-certificates/mozilla/Azure_Root_Certificate_Authority.crt \
    -keystore /app/truststore.jks \
    -storepass changeit \
    -noprompt

# Import AWS RDS root CA certificate into truststore
RUN keytool -importcert -trustcacerts \
    -alias aws-rds-root \
    -file /usr/share/ca-certificates/mozilla/Root-R1.crt \
    -keystore /app/truststore.jks \
    -storepass changeit \
    -noprompt

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup -g 1001 -S app && \
    adduser -u 1001 -S app -G app

# Set up working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Create logs directory
RUN mkdir -p /app/logs && \
    chown -R app:app /app

# Copy JAR from builder
COPY --from=builder --chown=app:app /build/target/*.jar /app/app.jar

# Set permissions
RUN chown -R app:app /app

USER app

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3000

# Healthcheck
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/health || exit 1

# Run as non-root
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar"]
